body_html:
Cuda Configuration Error: Error reading G:/cudnn/include/cudnn.h: java.io.IOExce
ption: ERROR: src/main/native/windows/processes-jni.cc(239): CreateProcessW("gre
p" --color=never -A1 -E "#define CUDNN_MAJOR" G:/cudnn/include/cudnn.h): ???????
????

This means either cudnn.h is unreadable for bazel, or it is not located at G:/cudnn/include/cudnn.h
What is the location of your cudnn headers on your machine?
Did you follow these:
https://docs.nvidia.com/deeplearning/sdk/cudnn-install/index.html#installwindows

body:
```
Cuda Configuration Error: Error reading G:/cudnn/include/cudnn.h: java.io.IOExce
ption: ERROR: src/main/native/windows/processes-jni.cc(239): CreateProcessW("gre
p" --color=never -A1 -E "#define CUDNN_MAJOR" G:/cudnn/include/cudnn.h): ???????
????
```
This means either cudnn.h is unreadable for bazel, or it is not located at `G:/cudnn/include/cudnn.h`
What is the location of your cudnn headers on your machine?
Did you follow these:
https://docs.nvidia.com/deeplearning/sdk/cudnn-install/index.html#installwindows
